title: ssh: >=16384 bytes of stderr hangs
body:
go version:
go1.1.1

go.crypto version:
81eec9b5ce2d

ssh client version:
OpenSSH_5.8p2, OpenSSL 1.0.0j-fips 10 May 2012

1. Grab the code from http://play.golang.org/p/m_TlS7uFet
2. replace username and password with real username and password
3. Run the program. It hangs on my machine.

If I reduce STDERR_SIZE by 1, it no longer hangs.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
linux
